analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta
dhamma anudhamma paṭipannassa bhikkhuno ayam anudhammaḥ hoti veyyākaraṇāya

original: dhammānudhammapaṭipannoyanti bhāsamāno dhammaññeva bhāsati no adhammaṁ, vitakkayamāno
analyzed: dhamma anudhamma paṭipanno yanti bhāsamānaḥ dhammaññā iva bhāsati no adhamma vitakkayamānaḥ

original: vā dhammavitakkaññeva vitakketi no adhammavitakkaṁ, tadubhayaṁ vā pana abhinivejjetvā
analyzed: vā dhamma vitakkañca eva vitakketi no adhamma vitakka tat ubhayam vā pana abhinivejjetvā

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
